channel.title: Mikaboshi on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Mikaboshi on ZooBerry

item.title: Halloween Pack 1 - Superheroes
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring superhero themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 2 - Classics
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring classic Halloween themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 3 - Fun
item.description: Reskins of animals with fun and creative themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 4 - Girly
item.description: Reskins of animals with girly and fantastical themes.

item.title: Halloween Pack 5 - Mickey and Minnie
item.description: Reskins of animals featuring Mickey and Minnie Mouse.

item.title: Sargassum
item.description: The first plant for the pelagic biome.

item.title: 3 Meerkat Variants
item.description: Three variant skins for the Meerkat.

item.title: African Buffalo Variant
item.description: A variant for the African Buffalo.

item.title: Black Florida Panther Variant
item.description: A melanistic/black variant for the Florida Panther.

item.title: Caracal Variants
item.description: Two caracal variants: one with darker extremities and a tawnier look.

item.title: Caribou Reskin and Variants
item.description: A realistic reskin for the caribou, as well as 4 variants.

item.title: Dark Bongo Variant
item.description: A darker variation for the Bongo.

item.title: Darker Faced Orangutan Variants
item.description: A darker-faced variant for the Orangutan.

item.title: Darker Male Ostrich Variant
item.description: A darker-plummaged variant for the male ostrich.

item.title: Ethiopian Wolf Variants
item.description: Two variant skins for the Ethiopian Wolf.

item.title: Flamingo Variants
item.description: Three variants for the Greater Flamingo.

item.title: Koala Reskin
item.description: Natural-looking skins for your koalas, with two male variants included.

item.title: Scalloped Hammerhead Variants
item.description: A more brown variant skin for the Scalloped Hammerhead Shark.

item.title: Komodo Dragon Variants
item.description: Three variants for Komodo Dragons, featuring unique skin variations.

item.title: Light Bongo Variant
item.description: A lighter, more orange variation for the Bongo.

item.title: Manta Ray Variants
item.description: Three Manta Ray variants with varying brightnesses of blue.

item.title: Realistic Nile Monitor Variant Skin
item.description: A more realistic variant skin for the Nile Monitor Lizard.

item.title: Secretary Bird Variants
item.description: Two grey variants for the Secretary Bird.

item.title: Two Gerenuk Variants
item.description: Two variant skins for the Gerenuk, orangish and dull brown.

item.title: Two Ratel Variants
item.description: Two variants of the Ratel, featuring different back colors.

item.title: Warthog Variants
item.description: Three variant skins for both male and female warthogs.

item.title: Whale Shark Variants
item.description: One lighter and one darker variant for the Whale Shark.

item.title: White Rhino Variants
item.description: Two variant skins for the White Rhinoceros.

item.title: Wildebeest Variants
item.description: Two wildebeest variants, one tannish and one grey with tan legs.

item.title: Wolverine Variants
item.description: A set of four variant skins for the Wolverine.

item.title: African Crowned Crane
item.description: A crane with recolored skins and a nest, inspired by the Secretary Bird.

item.title: Norwegian Fjord Pony
item.description: A domesticated pony, one of the oldest horse breeds known to mankind.

item.title: Island Excursions
item.description: Embark upon an excursion to travel the oceans in search of tropical paradise! Discover the isles hiding within the Hawaiian Islands and Papua New Guinea, seeing such animals as the Hawaiian Monk Seal and the Northern Cassowary as they live in their lush and vibrant homes.

item.title: Purple-Striped Jellyfish
item.description: Of all the gelatinous creatures visiting Monterey Bay, the purple-striped jelly is certainly among the most recognizable and spectacular.

item.title: ZT2DC Gazebo
item.description: This download was created as a collaboration between many members for the first Skinning Collage Event at ZT2DC.

item.title: Zebroid
item.description: A zebroid is a cross between a zebra and any other equid: essentially, a zebra hybrid.
